sentences.en: 'Young Jerry,'said Mr. Cruncher, turning to his offspring,'it's a buryin '.'
sentences.cn: “ 小杰瑞, ”克朗彻先生转身对他的下一代说, “ 是埋死人呢. ”

sentences.en: a young mother trying to control her offspring
sentences.cn: 一个想管住自己孩子的年轻妈妈

sentences.en: Eleanor was now less anxious about her offspring than she had once been.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺现在不像以往那样为孩子忧心了。

sentences.en: Flowers on variegated branches yield offspring that have variegated foliage.
sentences.cn: 有斑驳的枝条上的花,产生有变异叶片的后代.

sentences.en: How many offspring does a lion usually have?
sentences.cn: 一只狮子通常能生多少小狮子?

sentences.en: In complimenting you, she is a promise of superior offspring.
sentences.cn: 作为对你的补充, 她将保证你得到优秀的子孙.

sentences.en: Many animals display maternal instincts only while their offspring are young and helpless.
sentences.cn: 许多动物在其幼崽弱小无法自助时都显出了母性的本能.

sentences.en: Mares are surprisingly tolerant of the roughness and rudeness of their own offspring.
sentences.cn: 母马容忍后代粗暴和野蛮的程度教人意外.

sentences.en: Of course, not all alcoholics and drug abusers produce deviant offspring.
sentences.cn: 当然，并不是所有的酗酒者和吸毒者都会生育出不正常的后代。

sentences.en: The atomic bomb is the offspring of twentieth century physics.
sentences.cn: 原子弹是二十世纪物理学的产物.

sentences.en: The comet is going to come back in 2061 and we are all going to be able to see it. Well, our offspring are, anyway.
sentences.cn: 彗星将在2061年返回，到时我们都看得到。噢，反正我们的子孙看得到。

sentences.en: The offspring contain a mixture of the genetic blueprint of each parent.
sentences.cn: 子女身上遗传了父母双方的基因型板。

sentences.en: the problems parents have with their teenage offspring
sentences.cn: 父母与青少年子女之间的问题

sentences.en: This device is the offspring of his inventive mind.
sentences.cn: 这一装置是他那长于发明的头脑的产儿.

trans.tran_cn: 后代，子孙，产物，结果，（动物的）崽，幼苗
trans.tran_en: someone’s child or children – often used humorously
